bill.title: Enforcement Wage Hour Laws
bill.description: Concerning the enforcement of wage and hour laws, and, in connection therewith, making an appropriation.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Business Affairs & Labor
House Committee on Business Affairs & Labor Refer Unamended to Finance
House Committee on Finance Refer Amended to Appropriations
House Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Business, Labor, & Technology
Senate Committee on Business, Labor, & Technology Refer Unamended to Appropriations
Senate Committee on Appropriations Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
Senate Third Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
Senate Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Laid Over Daily
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate

votes.desc: House Business Affairs & Labor: Refer House Bill 25-1001 to the Committee on Finance.
House Finance: Adopt amendment L.005 (Attachment B).
House Finance: Adopt amendment L.008 (Attachment C). The motion was withdrawn.
House Finance: Adopt amendment L.011 (Attachment D).
House Finance: Adopt amendment L.012 (Attachment E).
House Finance: Refer House Bill 25-1001, as amended, to the Committee on Appropriations.
House Appropriations: Refer House Bill 25-1001, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.
Senate Business, Labor, & Technology: Refer House Bill 25-1001 to the Committee on Appropriations.
Senate Appropriations: Refer House Bill 25-1001, as amended, to the Committee of the Whole.

calendar.description: Senate Senate Business, Labor, & Technology Committee Hearing
